<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dig Quickly](/Feats.aspx?ID=1214) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 72</row>

**Requirements**
You are standing on dirt, sand, snow, or similar particulate material.

</column>

---

Your hands work as effectively as shovels when you need to dig a quick hole. You dig a shallow pit in the square you currently occupy, turning the square into difficult terrain (including for you). In addition, you also kick up a cloud of grit in a direction of your choice. The cloud extinguishes small, unattended, non-magical fires and helps smother the flames on burning creatures located within the cone; creatures in this cone that are taking [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) can immediately attempt an additional flat DC 15 check to end the persistent damage.

<title level="2">Dig Quickly leads to...</title>
[Sodbuster](/Feats.aspx?ID=1224)
